org.jredis.ri.alphazero
Class ProtocolBase.StreamBufferRequest

java.lang.Object
  org.jredis.ri.alphazero.ProtocolBase.StreamBufferRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Message, Request
Enclosing class:
ProtocolBase
public static class ProtocolBase.StreamBufferRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Request

SimpleRequest implements the required Message.read(InputStream) using a (likely) shared data buffer. It is not thread safe and can only be used by connections that serialized request processing through a single requesting thread.

Specifically, if an instance of this class is obtained and not immediately used (by calling read) before the user has obtained another instance of the same, data corruption is guaranteed.

Since:
alpha.0
Version:
alpha.0, 04/02/09
Author:
Joubin Houshyar (alphazero@sensesay.net)
